Title: Allows certain physically disabled individuals to complete the live-fire range training course for a concealed carry license while sitting
Summary: Allows physically disabled individuals who are not able to stand up to complete the two-hour live-fire range training course requirement for a concealed carry license while sitting.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to allowing certain physically disabled individuals to complete live-fire range training course and proficiency demonstration requirements for a concealed carry license while sitting
